summary:
Interesting paper: “Generative AI Misuse: A Taxonomy of Tactics and Insights from Real-World Data“:
Generative, multimodal artificial intelligence (GenAI) offers transformative potential across industries, but its misuse poses significant risks.  Prior research has shed light on the potential of advanced AI systems to be exploited for malicious purposes.  However, we still lack a concrete understanding of how GenAI models are specifically exploited or abused in practice, including the tactics employed to inflict harm...
title: Taxonomy of Generative AI Misuse

summary:
It's been a crazy morning here for one reason or another, so this afternoon, me and mine are going to camp out on the couch and watch the closing ceremony of the Paris Olympics.  We have a bucket of butter salted popcorn, chips (crisps if you live in the UK) a box of assorted Lindt chocolates (although that's for the OH, not me) and a pitcher of lemonade. 
Not exactly the healthiest of diets but hey, it's Sunday, and for reasons I won't go into right now, we deserve the junk food break...
title: Junk Food Break
